ygData.subject: The Mission
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t worry about it, Dcoburn! ... Zardus nods at Skulletron s responce. So far, this was good. No, he says in responce to Feline s question, Sabotauge

Subject: The Mission
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Don't worry about it, Dcoburn!

::Zardus::

Zardus nods at Skulletron's responce. So far, this was good.

"No," he says in responce to Feline's question, "Sabotauge would be too 
dangerous. Instead, you two are meerly scanning."

He looks at the two, wondering if they could pull this off. "You two will 
arrive at the Maximal base, posing as two Maximals."

Zardus looks at Feline, "You shall use your charm, along with some help from 
Skulletron's abilities, to lure the Maximals into giving you two quarters. 
Once inside, you will scan the ship, and use the computers in your quarters 
to find out as much as you can about it, the defences and everything. Get a 
tour if you can."

He presses a button on the holo-projector, the hologram disapearing. "Then 
you two get out."

Zardus looks at Skulletron, "This is where your part really begins. On your 
way out, you shall tamper with the Maximals' emotions. Make them mad at each 
other, or fall in love with different bots."

He presses another button on the holo-projector, an image of Iron Raptor 
appearing. "This is their leader," he says, pointing to the projection, "If 
you can make them fall in love with her, it would make a good amount of 
trouble between the Maximals. But don't overdo it, if they're killing each 
other in the halls, you'll have trouble getting out."

Zardus looks at the two bots, "Any questions?"
